sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' function About() { return (
Cancellation & Refund Policy
{/*
  • Introduction
    This Cancellation & Refund Policy outlines the terms under which donations made to Sanjeevani Foundation can be canceled or refunded. By making a donation, you agree to these terms.
  • Cancellation Policy
    (a) Donation Cancellations
    Donations made through our website are generally considered final. However, if you wish to cancel a donation, please contact us as soon as possible at [info@sanjeevanifoundation.org]. We will make every effort to accommodate your request if the donation has not yet been processed or utilized.

    (b) Process
    To request a cancellation, please provide the following information
    • Donation ID or reference number
    • Date of donation
    • Amount donated
    • Reason for cancellation
  • Refund Policy
    (a) Refunds
    Donations are typically non-refundable. If there is an exceptional circumstance or error in processing, please contact us within [number] days of the donation at [info@sanjeevanifoundation.org] to request a refund.

    (b) Eligibility for Refunds
    Refunds may be granted in cases such as
    • Duplicate transactions
    • Errors in processing
    • Miscommunication or misunderstanding

    (c) Refund Process
    To request a refund, please provide the following information
    • Donation ID or reference number
    • Date of donation
    • Amount donated
    • Reason for refund request
  • Processing Time
    Refunds, if approved, will be processed within [number] business days from the date of approval. Refunds will be issued to the original payment method used for the donation.
*/}
Cancellation & Refund Policy
Last updated on Aug 9th 2024
No cancellations & Refunds are entertained
) } export default About
